configurations.name: AI: Dev (terminal)
configurations.command: powershell -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "if (Get-Command python -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue) { python -m uvicorn main:app --reload --port 8001 } elseif (Get-Command py -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue) { py -m uvicorn main:app --reload --port 8001 } else { Write-Host 'Python not found. Install Python 3.x (winget install -e --id Python.Python.3.12) and re-run.'; exit 1 }"
